ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All Items Include Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens - Factory Refurbished + <2> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <5> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <6> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> LCD Screen Protectors + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens with 32GB Card + Tripod + Remote + Case + Filter + Tele/Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit (Refurbished By Nikon USA)
